item.title: C. P. Accountant
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: This is where an accountant bio would go. It would include lots of interesting information about Mr. C. P. Accountant, preferably things that potential clients would actually be interested in. Remember, your clients don't care where you went to school... they care about what you can do for them & their business.

item.title: Rebecca Brown
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
Rebecca Brown, a fictional accountant with Sample & Testing, has been helping for imaginary clients' improve their businesses since 1996.
With a focus on tax law, Rebecca helps companies in a variety of ways. item.title: Tyler Young
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: Tyler Young isn't actually an accountant at Sample & Testing. He's the developer of this WordPress theme. If you have trouble with the theme, you can email him at [his first name] [at symbol] conversioninsights.net

item.title: Lisa Auditor
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
Lisa has been with Sample & Testing since the beginning. If she were a real staff member, this would be her bio, and it might talk about her experience with income tax audits. Here's what Wikipedia has to say on the subject:
In the United States of America, an income tax audit is the examination of a business or individual tax return by the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) or state tax authority. The IRS and states interchangeably use the terms audit, examination, review, and notice to describe the enforcement of tax codes and filing returns accurately.

item.title: Accounting & Auditing
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
Sample & Testing works alongside your business to provide exactly the accounting services you need---from audits, to reviews, analyses, and forecasts. If Sample & Testing were a real accounting firm, we would go into detail about the services we provide, the clients we serve, and how the reader can take the next step toward becoming a client. As it is, however, this is just placeholder text to show you what a practice area page looks like. Here's a fake testimonial about our accounting services:
Sample & Testing has kept my business running since Day 1. They've educated my staff along the way, advised us where we could be more efficient, and been constantly available when we needed them. ---Jane Doe, Owner of Acme Widgets, Inc.
Interested in what Sample & Testing can do for you? Schedule a free consultation today!
Schedule a Free Consultation

item.title: Startups
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
Sample & Testing helps startups hit the ground running. From bookkeeping to payroll to tax compliance, we're experienced in the needs of new businesses, and our services can grow with you. If Sample & Testing were a real accounting firm, we would go into detail about the services we provide, the clients we serve, and how the reader can take the next step toward becoming a client. As it is, however, this is just placeholder text to show you what a practice area page looks like. Here's a fake testimonial about our services for startups:
Sample & Testing has kept my business running since Day 1. They've become our trusted advisors, and I can't imagine doing business without them. ---John Doe, Owner of Acme Widgets, Inc.
Interested in what Sample & Testing can do for you? Schedule a free consultation today!
Schedule a Free Consultation

item.title: Economic Incentives Consulting
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
Sample & Testing can help your business take advantage of tax breaks, government assistance programs, and more. When it comes to the opportunities available to your business, the field is constantly changing. We stay up-to-date so you don't have to. If Sample & Testing were a real accounting firm, we would go into detail about the services we provide, the clients we serve, and how the reader can take the next step toward becoming a client. As it is, however, this is just placeholder text to show you what a practice area page looks like. Here's a fake testimonial about our services for tax incentives:
Sample & Testing helped us save over $500,000 last year by taking advantage of tax breaks we never even knew existed. ---Jane Doe, Owner of Acme Widgets, Inc.
Interested in what Sample & Testing can do for you? Schedule a free consultation today!
Schedule a Free Consultation

item.title: Personal Taxes
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
We don't just serve businesses. Sample & Testing can help you file your personal tax return as well. Tax compliance can be frustrating to do alone---we can make it painless. If Sample & Testing were a real accounting firm, we would go into detail about the services we provide, the clients we serve, and how the reader can take the next step toward becoming a client. As it is, however, this is just placeholder text to show you what a practice area page looks like. Here's a fake testimonial about our tax services:
I'll never file my own taxes again. Goodbye, Turbotax---I'll never look back after getting help from Sample & Testing. ---John Doe, Local Taxpayer
Interested in what Sample & Testing can do for you? Schedule a free consultation today!
Schedule a Free Consultation

item.title: A Sample Landing Page
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: This is a sample landing page. It's an extremely stripped-down version of a standard Web page, designed with exactly one goal in mind: To get the visitor to take a particular action (like filling out a form). So go ahead. Tell us about your problem using the form below. Our accountants will contact you within the hour to schedule a free consultation. [contact-form-7 id="86"]

item.title: Full Width Content (No Sidebar)
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
This is a basic Wordpress page with no sidebar. Typically, a full-width layout is a bad idea, because when your lines are too long, they become hard to read. item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
One of New York's Oldest Accounting Firms

For over 90 years, Sample & Testing has helped clients with tax compliance, payroll, auditing, and more. We act as trusted advisors to our clients, helping them achieve their goals and set even bigger ones for the future.

News

  • Sample & Testing recognized as a top accounting firm
  • Another equally exciting news item here
  • A third placeholder news item
  • Final news item here

Our Practice Areas

[practiceareas max=10 columns=4 length=100 /]

Contact our office now!Schedule a free consult.

Our office is ready to help with your problems.

Meet Our CPAs

[staff columns=4 length=0 /]
 

What Our Clients Say

[testimonialswidget_widget random=true]

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

item.title: Andrew Kaplan, Owner Walden Pond Design
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: The Internet is filled with tons of WordPress themes, and at times it's difficult to pick one. In addition to looking great, [Conversion Insights'] themes are packed with easy-to-use functionality, customization, and documentation. As if that's not enough, [their] support (if needed) is prompt and complete. I highly recommend [Conversion Insights'] themes.

item.title: Mike Brown
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: My business wouldn't be where it is today without Sample & Testing. They're simply the best.

item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded: The folks at Sample & Testing, P.C. are fantastic to work with. They explained things in a way I could understand, so that I could make the best decision possible.

item.title: Sample Blog Post
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
What is accounting? Here's what Wikipedia has to say: Accounting or Accountancy is the measurement, processing and communication of financial information about economic entities. It was established by the Italian mathematician Luca Pacioli, in 1494. Accounting, which has been called the "language of business", measures the results of an organization's economic activities and conveys this information to a variety of users including investors, creditors, management, and regulators. Practitioners of accounting are known as accountants. The terms accounting and financial reporting are often used as synonyms. Accounting can be divided into several fields including financial accounting, management accounting, auditing, accounting information system and tax accounting. Accounting information systems are designed to support accounting functions and related activities. Financial accounting focuses on the reporting of an organization's financial information, including the preparation of financial statements, to external users of the information, such as investors, regulators and suppliers; and management accounting focuses on the measurement, analysis and reporting of information for internal use by management.[1][8] The recording of financial transactions, so that summaries of the financials may be presented in financial reports, is known as bookkeeping, of which double-entry bookkeeping is the most common system.

History

The history of accounting is thousands of years old and can be traced to ancient civilizations.[12][13][14] The early development of accounting dates back to ancientMesopotamia, and is closely related to developments in writing, counting and money;[12]there is also evidence for early forms of bookkeeping in ancient Iran,[15][16] and early auditing systems by the ancient Egyptians and Babylonians.[13] By the time of the Emperor Augustus, the Roman government had access to detailed financial information.[17] Double-entry bookkeeping developed in medieval Europe,[18] and accounting split into financial accounting and management accounting with the development of joint-stock companies. The first work on a double-entry bookkeeping system was published in Italy, by Luca Pacioli.[19] Accounting began to transition into an organized profession in the nineteenth century,[20] with local professional bodies in England merging to form the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales in 1880.[21]

Accounting and accountancy

Accounting has variously been defined as the keeping or preparation of the financial records of an entity, the analysis, verification and reporting of such records and "the principles and procedures of accounting"; it also refers to the job of being an accountant.[25][26][27] Accountancy refers to the occupation or profession of an accountant,[28][29][30] particularly in British English.

See also

  • Business
  • Finance
  • Economics

item.title: Accounting Services for the San Francisco Area
item.dc:creator: bitnami
item.content:encoded:
By creating blog posts specific to your accounting firm's local area, you can attract more potential clients from Google searches. Here's an excerpt from our guide on improving your business's performance in local search:

Local search, and what it means to you

If you run a small business, chances are you’re primarily a local business—you might do some sales on your Web site, but a lot of your sales come from word-of-mouth or walk-ins to your physical store. Local businesses face special challenges when it comes to marketing in the search engines. After all, there are probably the “big guys” in your industry that dominate the search results for your market, and competing with them can be extraordinarily difficult. Luckily, Google and other major search engines have your back—they make it easy to get on the map (literally and metaphorically!) and will even favor local results over “global” ones in some cases. Let’s talk about how you take advantage of all this.
Read more on the Conversion Insights blog
